titleStmt.title: Wooll being the cheife comoditie of this kingdome, it is thought good for this common weale, to aduance it to the highest rate that conueniently it may bee.

notesStmt.note: Requesting an act for free trade to remedy encroachments of the Merchant Adventurers. The bill had it 2nd reading 7 May 1621 and was passed 24 Nov. 1621. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
